name: Grandstand
description: Grandstand is an AI-powered studio that helps athletes engage and monetize their fans by automatically tracking games and results, gathering relevant media, and generating prompts and highlights that make social media easy.
one_liner: Grandstand is an AI-powered studio that helps athletes engage and monetize their fans by automatically tracking games and results, gathering relevant media, and generating prompts and highlights that make social media easy.
location: New York City, New York, United States
